I'm just wanting to build something in (as simple as possible) to check so the player can't walk out the door without a shirt or something.
On a related note, what would be the easiest way to prevent removal in public areas? Add a script to each garment that checks the current room for a "room.Public=True" before removing, or something?

Posts.EditableText: For doors or exits yes, you can set a bool(true or false) and under the exit there is a tab run script before entering. So if bool = true move player to room else print message"You need cloths on before you enter."
